title: [ROCm] Compilation error (missing caffe2/core/hip/context_hip.h)
body_html:
🐛 Bug

Compiling pytorch from master branch gives this error :

(snipped)
[ 77%] Building HIPCC object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_hip.dir/core/hip/caffe2_hip_generated_common_miopen.cc.o
In file included from /home/faergil/utils/rocm/tmp/pytorch/caffe2/core/hip/common_miopen.cc:17:
/home/faergil/utils/rocm/tmp/pytorch/caffe2/core/hip/miopen_wrapper.h:6:10: fatal error: 'caffe2/core/hip/context_hip.h' file not found
#include "caffe2/core/hip/context_hip.h"
         ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1 error generated.
In file included from /home/faergil/utils/rocm/tmp/pytorch/caffe2/core/hip/common_miopen.cc:17:
/home/faergil/utils/rocm/tmp/pytorch/caffe2/core/hip/miopen_wrapper.h:6:10: fatal error: 'caffe2/core/hip/context_hip.h' file not found
#include "caffe2/core/hip/context_hip.h"
         ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1 error generated.
CMake Error at /opt/rocm/hip/cmake/FindHIP/run_make2cmake.cmake:18 (file):
  file failed to open for reading (No such file or directory):

    /home/faergil/utils/rocm/tmp/pytorch/build/caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_hip.dir/core/hip/caffe2_hip_generated_common_miopen.cc.o.depend.pre


CMake Error at caffe2_hip_generated_common_miopen.cc.o.cmake:134 (message):
  Error generating
  /home/faergil/utils/rocm/tmp/pytorch/build/caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_hip.dir/core/hip/./caffe2_hip_generated_common_miopen.cc.o


make[2]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_hip.dir/build.make:38180: caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_hip.dir/core/hip/caffe2_hip_generated_common_miopen.cc.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/Makefile2:4173: caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_hip.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [Makefile:141: all] Error 2
Failed to run 'bash ../tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-rocm --use-nnpack --use-qnnpack caffe2'

To Reproduce

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch
python tools/amd_build/build_pytorch_amd.py
python setup.py install

Environment

  • PyTorch Version (e.g., 1.0): master branch
  • OS (e.g., Linux): Linux
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
  • Build command you used (if compiling from source):
  • Python version: 3.6
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: none
  • GPU models and configuration:
  • Any other relevant information:

Additional context

caffe2/core/hip/context_hip.h has been deleted by commit 883da9

But it's still included in the following files :

  • caffe2/operators/rnn/hip/recurrent_op_miopen.h
  • caffe2/operators/hip/activation_ops_miopen.h
  • caffe2/core/hip/miopen_wrapper.h

body:
## 🐛 Bug

Compiling pytorch from master branch gives this error :

	(snipped)
	[ 77%] Building HIPCC object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_hip.dir/core/hip/caffe2_hip_generated_common_miopen.cc.o
	In file included from /home/faergil/utils/rocm/tmp/pytorch/caffe2/core/hip/common_miopen.cc:17:
	/home/faergil/utils/rocm/tmp/pytorch/caffe2/core/hip/miopen_wrapper.h:6:10: fatal error: 'caffe2/core/hip/context_hip.h' file not found
	#include "caffe2/core/hip/context_hip.h"
	         ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
	1 error generated.
	In file included from /home/faergil/utils/rocm/tmp/pytorch/caffe2/core/hip/common_miopen.cc:17:
	/home/faergil/utils/rocm/tmp/pytorch/caffe2/core/hip/miopen_wrapper.h:6:10: fatal error: 'caffe2/core/hip/context_hip.h' file not found
	#include "caffe2/core/hip/context_hip.h"
	         ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
	1 error generated.
	CMake Error at /opt/rocm/hip/cmake/FindHIP/run_make2cmake.cmake:18 (file):
	  file failed to open for reading (No such file or directory):

	    /home/faergil/utils/rocm/tmp/pytorch/build/caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_hip.dir/core/hip/caffe2_hip_generated_common_miopen.cc.o.depend.pre


	CMake Error at caffe2_hip_generated_common_miopen.cc.o.cmake:134 (message):
	  Error generating
	  /home/faergil/utils/rocm/tmp/pytorch/build/caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_hip.dir/core/hip/./caffe2_hip_generated_common_miopen.cc.o


	make[2]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_hip.dir/build.make:38180: caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_hip.dir/core/hip/caffe2_hip_generated_common_miopen.cc.o] Error 1
	make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/Makefile2:4173: caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_hip.dir/all] Error 2
	make: *** [Makefile:141: all] Error 2
	Failed to run 'bash ../tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-rocm --use-nnpack --use-qnnpack caffe2'


## To Reproduce

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch
python tools/amd_build/build_pytorch_amd.py 
python setup.py install

## Environment

 - PyTorch Version (e.g., 1.0): **master branch**
 - OS (e.g., Linux): **Linux**
 - How you installed PyTorch (`conda`, `pip`, source): **source**
 - Build command you used (if compiling from source):
 - Python version: **3.6**
 - CUDA/cuDNN version: **none**
 - GPU models and configuration:
 - Any other relevant information:

## Additional context

caffe2/core/hip/context_hip.h has been deleted by commit [883da9](https://github.com/iotamudelta/pytorch/commit/883da952be8f42df9294c6fd96baab67af455709)

But it's still included in the following files :

- caffe2/operators/rnn/hip/recurrent_op_miopen.h
- caffe2/operators/hip/activation_ops_miopen.h
- caffe2/core/hip/miopen_wrapper.h
